column3: hwehwɛ nankasa n’apɛdze: Ɔnngye nsusui papa biara nnto mu."
Na mbom dɛ n’akoma bɛda edzi ntsi ara."

column2: "Nyimpa n’anomu nsɛm tse dɛ esubun: Nyansa no nsunyiwa tse dɛ bura a ɔpem."

column3: Anaadɛ wɔbɛdan ɔtseneneenyi enyi wɔ atsɛmbu mu."
Na n’anofamfa nye ne kra n’efirsua."

column2: "Bɔ tom kɛkanyi no ne nsɛm tse dɛ trɔma dɛɛdɛw
column3: Na osian kɔ yafun ne mpiatun noho."

column2: "EWURADZE ne dzin yɛ aban dzendzen: Ɔtseneneenyi guan kɔdɔ mu a
"Obirɛmpɔn n’ahonya nye kurow a ɔyɛ dzen
column3: Na ɔtse dɛ fasu a ɔkrɔn wɔ nankasa n’adwen mu."

column2: "Enyidzi biara nnyi hɔ ma nyia ɔmema noho do no
column3: Na ahopɔw dze nyimpa kɔ ɔsɛɛ mu."
Ɔyɛ nkwaseasɛm na enyito ma no."

column2: "Nyimpa no sunsum na osuo n’ahomberɛw mu: Na sunsum bobɔe dze

column3: Na onyansafo n’asowa hwehwɛ nyimdzee ekyir kwan."
Na ɔdze no ba ekunyin enyim."

column4: Kɛpem dɛ nyia ɔnye no enya no ba bɛda no edzi."

column2: "Ɔyɛ dzen dɛ nsa bɛka onua a wɔafom no no
column3: sen kurow dzendzen: Osiandɛ aperperdzi tse dɛ aban adaban."

column2: "Nyimpa ne yafun wɔdze n’anomu aba bɛhyɛ no ma
"Owu na nkwa wɔ tɛkyerɛma no tum mu; Na hɔn a wɔdɔ no no
"Ɔbɔbɔfo dze akyɛpa kasa: Na obirɛmpɔn dze

column4: ɔnyɛnko bi wɔ hɔ a ɔfam ho kɛse sen onua."
